enhanced_description: Employee hub LLP is an HRTech and recruitment consulting firm based in India, operating as an extended team to help clients connect employers with employees for the right opportunities and resources. They specialize in corporate resource management, talent acquisition, and HR solutions, serving a network of professionals across various industries and sectors. Their services encompass end-to-end talent search, including optimal sourcing strategies and successful onboarding for profiles such as Recruiters, Customer Service, Software Development, Finance, Marketing, and Lead Generation, including specialized SAP hiring. Beyond recruitment, Employee hub LLP offers corporate training and employee engagement activities aimed at improving employee retention and fostering employee growth. They leverage technology for quick turnaround times, supporting the entire employee lifecycle for businesses ranging from startups to large enterprises, with a focus on accelerating hiring processes and boosting hiring manager confidence.
key_use_cases: Full-cycle talent acquisition and recruitment for various business operations (e.g., Recruiters, Customer Service, Software Development, Finance, Marketing, Lead Generation)
Specialized talent acquisition for SAP roles
Advising on optimal sourcing strategies for talent
Implementing and measuring employee engagement activities to boost retention
Strategic HR resource management and consulting
competitive_advantages: Operates as an extended team/trusted partner for clients
Offers quick turnaround time for services
Provides end-to-end search solutions for talent acquisition
Focuses on improving employee retention through corporate trainings and engagement
Supports strategic business growth through talent acquisition
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
